text: Time Warner Cable was an American cable and telecommunications company. The company served almost 30 states. It was the second-largest cable company behind Comcast. They offered Cable television and Internet services. Time Warner Cable was founded in 1973. It wasbought by Charter Communications in May 2016. ==References== Category:American television providers Category:1989 establishments in the United States Category:Time Warner Category:American internet service providers Category:Companies based in New York City Category:1989 establishments in New York (state)
title: Time Warner Cable
